topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53de933d63687261fbba0100#post_53de933d63687261fbba0100

Well, guys, _Man of Steel_ WAS showing Superman at the beginning of his career so of course he wouldn't necessarily have a lot of training to keep collateral damage under check, especially since he'd been fighting other Kryptonians, but those who were soldiers and didn't share his sanctity for life. That's why so much collateral damage occured. And seriously, it is a gimme that someone as powerful as Superman would have a hard time facing someone on par with him as well as trying to keep people safe. No one ever said it's easy to be a superhero, even for someone like *Superman*.
